put.mlc.utils

Class SelectionSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • put.mlc.utils.SelectionSort

  • public class SelectionSort
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the selection sort algorithm based on Dual-Pivot Quicksort designed by Vladimir Yaroslavskiy, Jon Bentley, and Josh Bloch (implementation from Java 1.7).
    Author:
    Arkadiusz Jachnik

        public static void select(double[] a,
          int[] index,
          int kk)
        Select k-best values from array
        Parameters:
        a - the array to be sorted
        index - the array of indexes to be sorted
        kk - defines the number of k best values to be selected

      • select

        public static void select(double[] a,
          int[] index,
          int left,
          int right,
          int kk)
        Select k-best values from the specified range of the array
        Parameters:
        a - the array to be sorted
        index - the array of indexes to be sorted
        left - the index of the first element, inclusive, to be sorted
        right - the index of the last element, inclusive, to be sorted
        kk - defines the number of k best values to be selected
